text: Ralph D. Gants (1954 - September 14, 2020) was an American Democratic politician and lawyer. He was the Chief Justice of the Massachusetts Supreme Judicial Court. He was nominated by Governor Deval Patrick and sworn in on July 28, 2014. He became a justice of the Massachusetts Supreme Court in 2009. He was born in New Rochelle, New York. On September 4, 2020 Gants was hospitalized after having a heart attack.Massachusetts Supreme Judicial Court chief hospitalized after suffering heart attack He died on September 14 at the age of 66.Ralph Gants, Chief Justice of Massachusetts' Top Court, Dies ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Lawyers from Massachusetts Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from New Rochelle, New York Category:Politicians from New Rochelle, New York Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Ralph Gants
